frase: Es lo que hemos discutido en la reunión anterior.
sentence: It is what we discussed in the previous meeting.

frase: Me gustaría saber que es el problema.
sentence: I would like to know what the problem is.

frase: ¿Que es el objetivo de esta tarea?
sentence: What is the goal of this task?

frase: No puedo creer que no es verdad.
sentence: I can't believe it's not true.

frase: Me sorprende que no es más grande.
sentence: I'm surprised it's not bigger.

frase: Lo que es importante es que estemos todos seguros.
sentence: What is important is that we are all safe.

frase: Lo que es interesante es que no hemos encontrado ninguna respuesta aún.
sentence: What is interesting is that we haven't found an answer yet.

frase: Creo que es mejor no decir nada al respecto.
sentence: I think it's best not to say anything about it.

frase: Creo que es hora de irnos a casa.
sentence: I think it's time for us to go home.

frase: Eso es lo que estoy tratando de decirte.
sentence: That is what I am trying to tell you.

frase: Eso es lo que está pasando aquí.
sentence: That is what is happening here.

frase: No sé que pasa es, pero algo anda mal.
sentence: I don't know what's going on, but something is wrong.

frase: ¿Sabes que pasa es con el carro? No arranca.
sentence: Do you know what's going on with the car? It won't start.

frase: No es cierto que él tenga la razón.
sentence: It's not true that he's right.

frase: No es cierto que yo haya dicho eso.
sentence: It's not true that I said that.

frase: Si es que hay un problema, lo resolveremos.
sentence: If there is a problem, we will resolve it.

frase: Si es que lo vuelves a hacer, tendrás consecuencias.
sentence: If you do it again, you will have consequences.

frase: Me gusta relajarme en el sofá al final del día.
sentence: I like to relax on the couch at the end of the day.

frase: No estaba seguro de lo que quería hacer al principio.
sentence: I wasn't sure what I wanted to do at first.

frase: Tomé la decisión correcta al final.
sentence: I made the right decision in the end.

frase: Cuando solté el globo, voló muy alto en el cielo.
sentence: When I released the balloon, it flew very high in the sky.

frase: Me sentí muy emocionada al verlo.
sentence: I felt very excited when I saw it.

frase: Al entrar en el cuarto, vi a un gato durmiendo en la cama.
sentence: When I entered the room, I saw a cat sleeping in the bed.

frase: Al salir de casa, me di cuenta de que había olvidado mis llaves.
sentence: When I left the house, I realized I had forgotten my keys.

frase: Al llegar al parque, vi a muchos niños jugando.
sentence: When I arrived at the park, I saw many children playing.

frase: Al caminar por el bosque, vi muchos animales diferentes.
sentence: When I walked through the forest, I saw many different animals.

frase: Me sentí muy descansada al despertar.
sentence: I felt very rested when I woke up.

frase: Me sentí muy feliz al sentir el sol en mi cara.
sentence: I felt very happy when I felt the sun on my face.

frase: Empecé a bailar al escuchar la música.
sentence: I started dancing when I heard the music.

frase: Me di cuenta de que el pastel era muy dulce al probarlo.
sentence: I realized the cake was very sweet when I tasted it.

frase: Vi que era muy tarde al mirar el reloj.
sentence: I saw that it was very late when I looked at the clock.

frase: Me emocioné con la historia al leer el libro.
sentence: I was excited by the story when I read the book.

frase: Es importante tomar su medicamento tres veces al día para mantenerse saludable.
sentence: It is important to take your medication three times a day to stay healthy.

frase: Estaba lloviendo fuertemente afuera mientras yo estaba cocinando al mismo tiempo.
sentence: It was raining heavily outside while I was cooking at the same time.

frase: Mi hermano y yo estábamos viendo televisión en el living al mismo tiempo que mi madre estaba haciendo la cena en la cocina.
sentence: My brother and I were watching television in the living room at the same time that my mother was making dinner in the kitchen.

frase: Los estudiantes deben respetar a sus maestros al igual que ellos deben respetar a los estudiantes.
sentence: Students must respect their teachers just as they must respect the students.

frase: Mi vecina siempre se viste con ropa elegante al igual que una celebridad.
sentence: My neighbor always dresses in elegant clothing just like a celebrity.

frase: El perro duerme al lado de la chimenea.
sentence: The dog sleeps next to the fireplace.

frase: La tienda está al lado de la parada de autobús.
sentence: The store is next to the bus stop.

frase: Juan trabaja al tiempo que estudia.
sentence: Juan works while he studies.

frase: El avión despega al tiempo que el sol se pone.
sentence: The plane takes off while the sun sets.

frase: Al día siguiente, me desperté temprano para hacer ejercicio.
sentence: The following day, I woke up early to exercise.

frase: Al día siguiente de la fiesta, todos tenían resaca.
sentence: The day after the party, everyone had a hangover.

frase: Al final de la calle hay un parque.
sentence: At the end of the street, there is a park.

frase: Al final de la presentación, el orador hizo una pregunta al público.
sentence: At the end of the presentation, the speaker asked the audience a question.

frase: Había una multitud en torno al artista callejero.
sentence: There was a crowd around the street artist.

frase: La mesa redonda estaba rodeada de sillas en torno al centro.
sentence: The round table was surrounded by chairs around the center.

frase: Trabajé mucho para ahorrar dinero y, al cabo, pude comprar el coche de mis sueños.
sentence: I worked hard to save money and, in the end, I was able to buy the car of my dreams.

frase: Estudiamos el problema detenidamente y, al cabo, encontramos la solución.
sentence: We studied the problem carefully and, in the end, we found the solution.
